constituent: haiku, person, un-, jail cell, prison bars
heisigStory: This character is used for the haiku, the 17-syllable poem that is one of Japan's best-known literary forms. Its elements: person .. . jail cell.
koohiiStory1: I pity the fool/ Who put me in this jail cell/ I pity the fool. (Credit taijuando).
koohiiStory2: I pity the fool/ Who put me in this jail/ I pity the fool.
